text: The Last Waltz was final concert of the Canadian/American rock group The Band. It took place on Thanksgiving (November 26) in 1976 at the Winterland Ballroom in San Francisco, California. It was also made into a movie by Martin Scorsese, that came out in 1978. Other musicians who were in The Last Waltz concert were: * Ronnie Hawkins * Dr. John * Bobby Charles * Neil Young * Neil Diamond * Joni Mitchell * Paul Butterfield * Muddy Waters * Eric Clapton * Emmylou Harris * Van Morrison * Bob Dylan * Ringo Starr * Ronnie Wood * Stephen Stills * Carl Radle Category:1976 in music Category:Music in San Francisco Category:English-language movies Category:1976 in the United States Category:1970s in California Category:Movies directed by Martin Scorsese Category:Concerts
title: The Last Waltz
